alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 8:18PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Livingston and northern Washtenaw Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 817 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Howell, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brighton around 825 PM EDT. Hamburg around 830 PM EDT. Whitmore Lake around 835 PM EDT. South Lyon around 840 PM EDT. Salem and Dixboro around 845 PM EDT. Ypsilanti around 850 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Plainfield, Hudson Mills Metropark, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Delhi Mills, Barton Hills, Conway Township, Pinckney State Recreation Area, Hudson Mills, Parkers Corners and Lakeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
